25-Aug-2023

New Docs

  • Title: Requesting Late Binding
  • Description: Requesting late binding provides a way to add or modify progressive MP4 renditions for an existing video without re-creating other existing renditions. This allows you to reduce processing time while adding needed features to existing videos. - New Product Feature!
  • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/dynamic-ingest/ingest-guides/requesting-late-binding.html
  • Product: Video Cloud
  • Product Area: Dynamic Ingest API
